nodes.text: Artok was a male Human who dwelt on the frozen ice planet of Hoth in the year 3643 BBY. He made his living on the world as a vendor and merchant, selling items and material to the Galactic Republic's citizens. He wore a brown and blue uniform.
Artok first appeared in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic for Republic allied classes. In the game, he serves as a crew skills vendor.
